jd: From: Bhavya, Source infotec inc bhavya.c@sourceinfotech.com Reply to: bhavya.c@sourceinfotech.com Job Title: Python DeveloperLocation: Phoenix, AZEXP: 9Visa: H4-EAD, USCSkills: (LLM/Gen AI/ML)Job Description:1) Design, develop, test, and deploy high-performance Generative AI-enabled capabilities.2) Build internal frameworks to facilitate integration of Generative AI with enterprise capabilities.3) Collaborate closely with engineers and scientists on strategy and roadmap.4) Keep up with AI advancements and test new ideas.Basic Qualifications:1) Proven, strong Python skills are a must. Open-source contributors are preferred.2) Experience in design/architecture of systems3) Full software development lifecycle experience4) Skilled in deploying and scaling products in public cloud.5) Experience in Generative AI and Large Language Models inference.6) Experience in AI tools and frameworks, such as Langchain, Llama Index, Semantic Kernel, etc.7) Passion for cutting edge technologies and excitement to be part of a Research & Development teamTHANKS & REGARDS Bhavya Chaturvedi Source Infotech IncP.O Box 577, EDISON, NJ 08818-0577EMAIL: bhavya.c@sourceinfotech.comPhone: 6097335170 | | Hangout:bhavyachaturvedi389
